Question: What is the profile image URL of the user with the screen name 'tech_guru'?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)
WHERE user.screen_name = "tech_guru"
RETURN user, user.profile_image_url
Rewrite: What is the URL of the profile picture for the user known as 'tech_guru'?

Question: Could you retrieve the location and follower count for the user who has posted a tweet with the hashtag '#machinelearning' more than 50 times?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE hashtag.name = "#machinelearning"
WITH user, COUNT(tweet) AS tweetsCount
WHERE tweetsCount > 50
RETURN user, posts, tweet, tags, hashtag, user.location, user.followers

Question: Please provide the URLs contained in the tweets that have been retweeted over 1000 times.
Cypher:
MATCH (originalTweet:Tweet)-[:RETWEETS]->(retweetedTweet:Tweet)-[:CONTAINS]->(link:Link)
WHERE retweetedTweet.favorites > 1000
RETURN originalTweet, retweetedTweet, link, link.url
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (originalTweet:Tweet)-[relation3:RETWEETS]->(retweetedTweet:Tweet)-[relation4:CONTAINS]->(link:Link)
WHERE retweetedTweet.favorites > 1000
RETURN relation4, relation3, originalTweet, retweetedTweet, link, link.url
Rewrite: Please supply the URLs found in tweets that were retweeted more than 1000 times.

Question: What are the names of the sources from which tweets were imported using the 'API' method, where each of these tweets has at least 500 favorites?
Cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[usingRel:USING]->(source:Source)
WHERE tweet.favorites >= 500 AND tweet.import_method = "API"
RETURN tweet, usingRel, source, source.name
Rewrite: Which sources supplied tweets that were imported via the 'API' method and have at least 500 favorites each?

Question: Can I get the text of tweets posted by the user named 'Jane_Doe' that contain a mention to 'John_Smith'?
Cypher:
MATCH (poster:User)-[:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User)
WHERE poster.screen_name = 'Jane_Doe' AND mentionedUser.screen_name = 'John_Smith'
RETURN poster, tweet, mentionedUser, tweet.text
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (poster:User)-[relation3:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation4:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User)
WHERE poster.screen_name = 'Jane_Doe' AND mentionedUser.screen_name = 'John_Smith'
RETURN relation4, relation3, poster, tweet, mentionedUser, tweet.text
Rewrite: Could you provide the content of the tweets from the user 'Jane_Doe' that include a reference to 'John_Smith'?

Question: What hashtags have been used by users located in 'New York City' in tweets that received more than 200 favorites?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE user.location = "New York City" AND tweet.favorites > 200
RETURN user, tweet, hashtag, hashtag.name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation3:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation4:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE user.location = "New York City" AND tweet.favorites > 200
RETURN relation4, relation3, user, tweet, hashtag, hashtag.name
Rewrite: Which hashtags did New York City users employ in tweets that garnered over 200 favorites?

Question: How many users from 'San Francisco' have more than 10000 followers?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)
WHERE user.location = "San Francisco" AND user.followers > 10000
RETURN count(user)
Rewrite: What is the number of users in 'San Francisco' with over 10000 followers?

Question: What is the average number of followers for users who follow more than 1000 people and have tweeted at least 500 tweets?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)
WHERE user.following > 1000 AND user.statuses >= 500
RETURN AVG(user.followers)
Rewrite: What is the typical follower count for users who follow over 1000 individuals and have posted a minimum of 500 tweets?

Question: Can you count the number of hashtags that have been used in more than 1000 tweets?
Cypher:
MATCH (hashtag:Hashtag)<-[tag:TAGS]-(tweet:Tweet)
WITH hashtag, COUNT(tweet) AS tweetCount
WHERE tweetCount > 1000
RETURN COUNT(hashtag)
Rewrite: Could you tally how many hashtags appear in over 1000 tweets?

Question: What is the maximum favorites a tweet has received among tweets containing the hashtag '#holiday' during December 2022?
Cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[tag:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE hashtag.name="#holiday" AND tweet.created_at.year=2022 AND tweet.created_at.month=12
RETURN MAX(tweet.favorites)
Rewrite: What is the highest number of favorites for any tweet with the '#holiday' hashtag in December 2022?

Question: What are the total and average retweets received by tweets from users with a follower count exceeding 5000?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)<-[:RETWEETS]-(retweet:Tweet)
WHERE user.followers > 5000
RETURN SUM(retweet.favorites) AS totalRetweets, AVG(retweet.favorites) AS averageRetweets
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation3:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)<-[relation4:RETWEETS]-(retweet:Tweet)
WHERE user.followers > 5000
RETURN SUM(retweet.favorites) AS totalRetweets, AVG(retweet.favorites) AS averageRetweets
Rewrite: What is the sum and mean number of retweets for tweets by users who have more than 5000 followers?

Question: How many tweets link to URLs that include 'news' in their domain, and what is the average number of favorites these tweets have received?
Cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[contains:CONTAINS]->(link:Link)
WHERE link.url CONTAINS "news"
RETURN count(tweet) AS NumberOfTweets, AVG(tweet.favorites) AS AverageFavorites
Rewrite: How many tweets contain links to URLs with 'news' in their domain, and what is the average number of likes these tweets have garnered?
